transforms.code:
#return value
	lable_list = []
	for lable in value:
		lable_list.append(lable['label'])
	labels = ', '.join(lable_list)
	return labels

options = []
	pydata = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(value)
	
	for row in pydata:
		label = row["Name"]
		value = row["ID"]
		options.append({ "label": label, "value": value })
		
	return options

config.script:
AttributeID = self.parent.parent.getChild("Main").getChild("Table").props.selection.data[0].AttributeID
	mes.quality.sp.disableTestAttribute(AttributeID)
	messageType = 'refreshAttributeTable'
	payload = {}
	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType, payload, view = 'session')
	
	self.parent.parent.getChild("Main").getChild("Table").props.selection.selectedColumn = None
	self.parent.parent.getChild("Main").getChild("Table").props.selection.selectedRow = None

import time
	
	# Refresh user table binding and rotate refresh icon.
	self.view.refreshBinding('custom.Data')
	self.rotateIcon()

customMethods.name: rotateIcon
customMethods.script:
import time
	
	# Rotate icon 360 degrees.
	for degree in range(0,361, 10):
		self.props.style.transform = 'rotate(' + str(degree) + 'deg)'
		time.sleep(0.0278)

selectedRowData = self.custom.RowData
		
	modalName = "editAttribute"
	modalPath = "App/Quality/AttributeManager/Embedded/Popups/EditAttributeItem"
	
	params = { "RowData": selectedRowData, "ModalName": modalName }
	
	errorParams = {
		"ModalName": "ErrorModal",
		"ErrorMessage": "Please select a row first!"
	}
	
	if len(selectedRowData) > 0:
		system.perspective.openPopup(
			modalName, 
			modalPath, 
			params, 
			title="Edit Attribute", 
			modal=True, 
			overlayDismiss=True)
	else:
		system.perspective.openPopup("ErrorModal", 
		"GlobalComponents/Modals/ErrorModal", 
		errorParams)

messageHandlers.script:
logger = system.util.getLogger('importAttributes')
	
	try:
	    csvString = payload.get("csvString")
	    csvDict = payload.get("csvDS")
	    pyData = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(csvDict)
	    system.perspective.print(csvString)
	    system.perspective.print(csvDict)
	    system.perspective.print(pyData)
	
	    for row in pyData:
	        TestTypeID = row['TestTypeID']
	        ProductCodeID = row['ProductCodeID']
	        Name = row['AttributeName']
	        TestAttributeDataTypeID = row['TestAttributeDataTypeID']
	        ValidStartDate = system.date.now()#row['ValidStartDate']
	        ValidEndDate = system.date.addDays(system.date.now(), 60)#row['ValidEndDate']
	        HiHiLimit = row['HiHiLimit']
	        HiLimit = row['HiLimit']
	        TargetValue = row['TargetValue']
	        LoLimit = row['LoLimit']
	        LoLoLimit = row['LoLoLimit']
	        MaterialID = row['MaterialID']
	        
	        
	        
	        
	        system.perspective.print('testtype ' + str(TestTypeID) + ' productcode ' + str(ProductCodeID) + ' material ' + str(MaterialID))
	        
	        mes.quality.sp.insertTestAttribute(TestTypeID=TestTypeID, 
	                                           Name=Name, 
	                                           TestAttributeDataTypeID=TestAttributeDataTypeID, 
	                                           ProductCodeID=ProductCodeID, 
	                                           MaterialID=MaterialID, 
	                                           ValidStartDate=ValidStartDate, 
	                                           ValidEndDate=ValidEndDate, 
	                                           HiHiLimit=HiHiLimit, 
	                                           HiLimit=HiLimit, 
	                                           TargetValue=TargetValue, 
	                                           LoLimit=LoLimit, 
	                                           LoLoLimit=LoLoLimit)
	        messageType = 'refreshAttributeTable'
        	payload = {}
        	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType, payload, view = 'session')
	
	except Exception as e:
	    errorParams = {
	        "ModalName": "ErrorModal",
	        "ErrorMessage": str(e),
	    }
	    
	    system.perspective.openPopup("ErrorModal", "GlobalComponents/Modals/ErrorModal", errorParams)
	    logger.warn('There was an error: ' + str(e))

# implement your handler here
	self.view.custom.ModalTitle = 'Edit Test Type'
